name: web-component-base
description: A zero-dependency, ~600 Bytes (minified & gzipped), JS base class for creating reactive custom elements easily

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate:types && npm run copy:meta && npm run copy:source && npm run minify
scripts.copy:meta: node prepare.js && cp README.md ./dist && cp LICENSE ./dist
scripts.pub: npm run clean && npm run build && cd ./dist && npm publish
scripts.pub:beta: npm run clean && npm run build && cd ./dist && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run pub
scripts.publish:patch:beta: npm version patch && npm run pub:beta
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run pub
scripts.publish:minor:beta: npm version minor && npm run pub:beta

author: Ayo Ayco
